content: The Alabama-based neo-Confederate group League of the South has launched a Russian-language page to promote 'Southern nationalism' ,https://,trib.al/j99IdiD, ,pic.twitter.com/dAjDdWbFOH
Lie #1 is the serving of Jesus Christ. Most Russians are atheists & nationalists worship their own skin. No holiness anywhere

This is a joke tactic by the LOTS but they do have a right to exist as long as BLM,Antifa,the Black Bloc,KKK,Muslim brotherhood all exist. Gotta be fair to everyone and their ideas. Thats a liberal tradition right ?

So the folks who are not white straight or Christian are just suppose to sit back and take whatever y'all dish out, GTFO,There wouldn't be a need for BLM ANTIFA or similar groups if KKK or ,#,homegrown, terrorists like that ,#,bullish, league did not exist,pic.twitter.com/OHA6DPn7Eg
never herd of them, must be one guy in his basement  ... this is news?  al dot com is a joke!
Not a joke. This is a real organization promoting a whites only America and now befriending Russia.
Really? Never heard of them or seen one, have you?  The only kkk member I’ve ever seen was dem Sen Robert Byrd, one of Hillary’s mentors!
Ask ,@,GradyHagg, he'll tell you what a fine organization they are. To continue on about Sen. Byrd he later renounced the KKK, was ashamed of himself, apologized and worked hard for civil rights.
